sx.blah.discord.handle.obj

Interface IGuild

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDiscordObject<IGuild>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Guild

    public interface IGuild
extends IDiscordObject<IGuild>
    This class defines a guild/server/clan/whatever it's called.

      • getUsersByName

        List<IUser> getUsersByName(String name)
        Gets all the users which have a display name (i.e. nickname if present else discord name) which matches the provided name. This is effectively the same as #getUsersByName(name, true).
        Parameters:
        name - The name to search for.
        Returns:
        The list of matching users.

      • getUsersByName

        List<IUser> getUsersByName(String name,
                           boolean includeNicknames)
        Gets all the users which have a name which matches the. provided name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to search for.
        includeNicknames - Whether to check nicknames in addition to normal names.
        Returns:
        The list of matching users.

      • reorderRoles

        void reorderRoles(IRole... rolesInOrder)
           throws DiscordException,
                  RateLimitException,
                  MissingPermissionsException
        This reorders the position of the roles in this guild.
        Parameters:
        rolesInOrder - ALL the roles in the server, in the order of desired position. The first role gets position 1, second position 2, etc.
        Throws:
        DiscordException
        RateLimitException
        MissingPermissionsException

      • getUsersToBePruned

        int getUsersToBePruned(int days)
                throws DiscordException,
                       RateLimitException
        Gets the amount of users that would be pruned for the given amount of days.
        Parameters:
        days - The amount of days of inactivity to lead to a prune.
        Returns:
        The amount of users.
        Throws:
        DiscordException
        RateLimitException
